trans-unit.resname: PS14·1 | Ajani Steadfast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Until end of turn, up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike, vigilance, and lifelink.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Until end of turn, up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike, vigilance, and lifelink.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·1 | Ajani Steadfast | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.
trans-unit.target: [−2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·1 | Ajani Steadfast | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−7]: You get an emblem with "If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage."
trans-unit.target: [−7]: You get an emblem with "If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage."

trans-unit.resname: PS14·62 | Jace, the Living Guildpact | Card Name
PS14·62 | Jace, the Living Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·62 | Jace, the Living Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·62 | Jace, the Living Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−8]: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You draw seven cards.
trans-unit.target: [−8]: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You draw seven cards.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·187 | Nissa, Worldwaker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·187 | Nissa, Worldwaker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Untap up to four target Forests.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Untap up to four target Forests.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·187 | Nissa, Worldwaker | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−7]: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Those lands become 4/4 Elemental creatures with trample. They're still lands.
trans-unit.target: [−7]: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Those lands become 4/4 Elemental creatures with trample. They're still lands.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·210 | Garruk, Apex Predator | Card Name
PS14·210 | Garruk, Apex Predator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PS14·210 | Garruk, Apex Predator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Create a 3/3 black Beast creature token with deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Create a 3/3 black Beast creature token with deathtouch.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·210 | Garruk, Apex Predator | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.

trans-unit.resname: PS14·210 | Garruk, Apex Predator | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [−8]: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn."
trans-unit.target: [−8]: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn."
